user_query: I'm a football blogger and I want to create engaging content about the performance of NFL teams. Can you provide me with the passing, rushing, and receiving data for the offense side in the year 2021? Additionally, I would like to know the win/loss data for the year 2020.

TaskList.description: Query the passing, rushing, and receiving statistics for NFL teams for the year 2021.
Query the win/loss data for NFL teams for the year 2020.
Combine the results of the statistics and win/loss data into a single engaging content piece for blog.
